944820.name: Just Fishing: River Valley
944820.description:
Journey to the west continues with the "River Valley Pack" expansion!
In a River valley far away from the civilization, you unexpectedly meet a little eccentric ichthyologist Albert Rybstein, who asks you to help. Together, you will explore the local fish species. The local river is famous for its variety of catfish, and also has a unique relict pike. A funny scientist rewards you well for the tasks, and for the successful completion of the whole expedition he will give you an exclusive reel!

In addition to the fascinating adventure on the wild and the very beautiful river in the "River Valley Pack", you will also have two unique medium rods, a set of baits and aromas, a series of special light lures and a game currency.
944820.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 俄语, 简体中文, 法语
